TyrePressureOption.title: Tyre Pressure Monitoring Option
TyrePressureOption.description: Units: Option. This is the master control of the Tyre Pressure Monitoring/Reporting feature. Note: Tyre status reporting only occurs on trucks fitted with either Continental or Pressure Pro TPMS sensors.

oneOf.title: Disabled
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure Reporting is disabled.

oneOf.title: Enabled
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure Reporting is enabled.

TyreGrease_ReportRate.title: Tyre Pressure/Grease Monitoring Report Rate
TyreGrease_ReportRate.description: Units: Minutes. Default reporting period of Tyre Pressure and Temperature and Truck Grease Status. Fault status is reported immediately. Note: Tyre status reporting only occurs on trucks fitted with either Continental or Pressure Pro TPMS sensors.

TPMS_MonTemp.title: Tyre Monitor Temperature
TPMS_MonTemp.description: Units: DegC. Specifies the tyre temperature threshold over which trigger the telemetry device to record/report the occurrence. Note: A value of 1736 disables FM1 temperature monitoring. Note: Tyre status reporting only occurs on trucks fitted with either Continental or Pressure Pro TPMS sensors. Note: The Pressure Pro TPMS sensor has built in tyre temperature monitoring, and provides an over temperature alert. This setting controls the Telemetry Device's internal tyre temperature monitoring, which is separate to the on-sensor monitoring.

TPMS_HighTempWarning.title: Tyre Over Temperature Warning
TPMS_HighTempWarning.description: Units: DegC. Specifies the tyre temperature threshold over which trigger the telemetry device to record/report the occurrence. Note: A value of 1736 disables FM1 temperature monitoring. Note: Tyre status reporting only occurs on trucks fitted with either Continental or Pressure Pro TPMS sensors. Note: The Pressure Pro TPMS sensor has built in tyre temperature monitoring, and provides an over temperature alert. This setting controls the Telemetry Device's internal tyre temperature monitoring, which is separate to the on-sensor monitoring.

CellModem_FotaVer.title: Modem FOTA Version
CellModem_FotaVer.description: Units: Version string. Specifies the expected version of the FOTA update, if this version is already running the FOTA process will be skipped.

CellModem_FotaUrl.title: Modem FOTA URL
CellModem_FotaUrl.description: Units: URL. Specifies the server end point address of the location of the modem firmware file to be downloaded.

CellModem_FotaCrc.title: Modem FOTA CRC
CellModem_FotaCrc.description: Units: CRC. Specifies the CRC of the modem firmware file to be downloaded.

CellModem_FotaOption.title: FOTA Selection
CellModem_FotaOption.description: Units: Option. Specifies which modem firmware image to download and apply.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: FOTA is disabled.

oneOf.title: Original to B
oneOf.description: EXS62-W modem original firmware (01.200/01.000.01) to firmware B (01.202T/01.000.01).

oneOf.title: B to Original
oneOf.description: EXS62-W modem firmware B (01.202T/01.000.01) back to original firmware (01.200/01.000.01).

oneOf.title: B to C
oneOf.description: EXS62-W modem firmware B (01.202T/01.000.01) to modem firmware C (01.202/01.000.01).

oneOf.title: C to B
oneOf.description: EXS62-W modem firmware C (01.202/01.000.01) back to modem firmware B (01.202T/01.000.01).

AccessLevelConversion.title: Access Level Conversion
AccessLevelConversion.description: When true, converts telemetry technician access level to truck supervisor. This avoids the telemetry technician from accessing service level configuration and calibration menus on the truck.

DailyPulse_Period.title: Daily Pulse Period
DailyPulse_Period.description: Units: Hours. When not set to zero, will trigger VAM to wakeup and connect if the VAM is not woken up otherwise for the period specified. Daily Pulse wake is silent (display and buzzer off) and VAM will re-enter sleep immediately after connection to avoid unnecessary battery drain. Requires IO firmware v7.4.1/v3.4.1.1 or later.

TruckPgmEnable.title: Truck Programming Enable
TruckPgmEnable.description: When true, Truck VSM, Truck CDF and Truck controllers are able to be programmed remotely through the Truck OTA Portal page via the VAM.

VSM_UrgentSpeedLimitEnable.title: Urgent Update Travel Speed Limit Enable

TicEnable.title: TIC4.0 Enable
TicEnable.description: When true, VAM periodically requests TIC data from Truck and publishes the TIC data to the TIC broker.

TicModel.title: TIC4.0 Model
TicModel.description: Specifies which release of TIC4.0 the output will adhere to.

TicContentLevel.title: TIC4.0 Content Level
TicContentLevel.description: Specifies the level of content the TIC4.0 output will adhere to.

TicServerPort.title: TIC4.0 Broker Port Number
TicServerPort.description: Units: Port Number. Specifies the server port number of the TIC4.0 MQTT Broker used for uploading truck data.

TicServerIp.title: TIC4.0 Broker Address
TicServerIp.description: Units: IP Address or DNS name. Specifies the broker end point address, as a numeric IP address or DNS name, of the TIC4.0 MQTT Broker used for uploading truck data.

TicUsername.title: TIC4.0 Broker Username
TicUsername.description: Units: Username. Specifies part of the credentials required to connect to the TIC4.0 MQTT Broker used for uploading truck data.

TicPassword.title: TIC4.0 Broker Password
TicPassword.description: Units: Password. Specifies part of the credentials required to connect to the TIC4.0 MQTT Broker used for uploading truck data.

header.description: An object containing telemetry device identifying information for this message sent to the telemetry server. E.g. Device ID, Device Type, Message Type.

body.description: An object containing the data of the message sent to the telemetry server. E.g. event metadata and event data.

event.description: An object containing a set of telemetry event fields in the form of metadata and data.

events.description: An array containing a set of telemetry event objects in the form of metadata and data.

metadata.description: An object containing information about the telemetry event, e.g. Event Type, Event Version and Timestamp.

data.description: An object containing telemetry event fields specific to the event type.

message_type.description: The type of message transferred from device to server as an enum value. The only message type defined is an event message.

event_type.description: The type of the event as an enum value. e.g. session event, gps event, load event etc.

schema_version.description: The version of the event definition schema as a simple integer. A change to the event schema e.g. add/remove a field etc results in this version number being incremented.

timestamp.description: The date and time that the event was recorded (persisted in device memory).

EventTick.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every event logged by the telemetry device. Helps to determine that an event is unique, along with timestamp and event type, as one event type may be logged multiple times per second. The EventTick is included in every Event.

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

ImpactId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every impact detected by the telemetry device. This ID uniquely defines an impact for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

GpsPositionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every GPS position recorded/logged. This ID uniquely defines a GPS position for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events. The current value references the last logged GPS Position Event.

GpsPositionId_LadenStart.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the start of a load summary event.

GpsLat_LadenStart.title: GPS Latitude Start
GpsLat_LadenStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the start of a load summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_LadenStart.title: GPS Longitude Start
GpsLong_LadenStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the start of a load summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

GpsPositionId_OverloadStart.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the start of an overload summary event.

GpsLat_OverloadStart.title: GPS Latitude Start
GpsLat_OverloadStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the start of an overload summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_OverloadStart.title: GPS Longitude Start
GpsLong_OverloadStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the start of an overload summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

SessionDateTime_Start.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of the drive session event.

SessionDateTime_End.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the end of the drive session event.

SessionDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the drive session event.

ServiceHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime asset usage meter that the asset is serviced against, sampled at the start of this summary event.

EngineRunTimeMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of time asset has had its engine running, sampled at the start of this summary event.

HydraulicHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of asset's hydraulics usage, sampled at the start of this summary event.

TractionHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime hour meter of asset's drive motor usage, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Odometer_Start.description: Units: Metres. Sum of distance asset has traveled over it's lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

MonitoredDurationHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Sum of asset service hours that the telemetry module has spent monitoring asset, sampled at the start of this summary event.

ContainerCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

LadenHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent laden (carrying a load) over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

UnladenHourMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent on but unladen over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

LadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset spent laden (carrying a load) over the duration of this summary event.

LadenLoadWeight.description: Units: Kg. Asset's Load Weight averaged over time spent laden for this individual load summary event

FuelUsedMeter_Start.description: Units: 0.5 Litres. Sum of amount of fuel asset has consumed over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

IdleFuelUsedMeter_Start.description: Units: 0.5 Litres. Sum of amount of fuel asset has consumed while idle over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

ReachSecureMeter_Start.description: Units: Seconds. Lifetime asset usage meter that is incremented differently to the service meter, sampled at the start of this summary event.

IgnitionTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset's ignition key was active over the duration of this summary event.

OperatorPresenceTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset had an operator present over the duration of this summary event.

MovingTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was moving over the duration of this summary event.

MovingLadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was laden while moving over the duration of this summary event.

HydraulicTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset's hydraulics were in use over the duration of this summary event.

WorkingTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was working over the duration of this summary event.

SessionWorkingLadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was laden while working over the duration of this summary event.

WorkingLadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was laden while working over the duration of this summary event.

DistanceDriven.description: Units: Metres. Sum of distance asset traveled over the duration of this summary event.

DistanceDrivenLaden.description: Units: Metres. Sum of distance asset traveled while laden over the duration of this summary event.

EnergyConsumed.description: Units: kJ. Energy Consumed by the Asset over the duration of this summary event.

EnergyConsumedWorking.description: Units: kJ. Energy Consumed by the Asset while working over the duration of this summary event.

LiftDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset was lifting its tynes/tray/load over the duration of this summary event.

LowerDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset was lowering its tynes/tray/load over the duration of this summary event.

AuxiliaryHydraulicDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's auxiliary hydraulics were in use over the duration of this summary event.

AverageSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Average Speed over the duration of this summary event.

PeakSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Peak Speed over the duration of this summary event.

LowSpeedOperationDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent under the low speed operation threshold over the duration of this summary event.

MediumSpeedOperationDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent between the low and medium speed operation thresholds over the duration of this summary event.

HighSpeedOperationDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent over the high speed operation threshold over the duration of this summary event.

LowOverSpeedCount.description: Units: Count. Count of number of times asset's speed exceeded the low overspeed threshold over the duration of this summary event.

HighOverSpeedCount.description: Units: Count. Count of number of times asset's speed exceeded the high overspeed threshold over the duration of this summary event.

LowOverSpeedDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's speed exceeded the low overspeed threshold over the duration of this summary event.

HighOverSpeedDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset spent over the high overspeed threshold over the duration of this summary event.

ForwardGearDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's transmission was in forward gear over the duration of this summary event.

ReverseGearDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's transmission was in reverse gear over the duration of this summary event.

LowImpactCountStationary.description: Units: Count. The number of low level impacts detected while asset was not moving over the duration of this summary event. Low Level Impacts are defined as impacts that have a magnitude above the Low Impact Threshold, but below the High Impact Threshold.

LowImpactCountMoving.description: Units: Count. The number of low level impacts detected while asset was moving over the duration of this summary event. Low Level Impacts are defined as impacts that have a magnitude above the Low Impact Threshold, but below the High Impact Threshold.

HighImpactCountStationary.description: Units: Count. The number of high level impacts detected while asset was not moving over the duration of this summary event. High Level Impacts are defined as impacts that have a magnitude above the High Impact Threshold.

HighImpactCountMoving.description: Units: Count. The number of high level impacts detected while asset was moving over the duration of this summary event. High Level Impacts are defined as impacts that have a magnitude above the High Impact Threshold.

SeatBeltViolationCount.description: Units: Count. The number of seat belt violations that occurred over the duration of this summary event.

ParkBrakeViolationCount.description: Units: Count. The number of park brake violations that occurred over the duration of this summary event.

SeatBeltViolationDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration the asset was used while the operator had not correctly fastened their seat belt over the duration of this summary event.

ShutdownCause.description: Indicates how the drive session came to an end, i.e whether operator turned off the key, a critical event shutdown the truck, or the truck timed out due to inactivity, or a number of other reasons.

RPAAutoMovesCount.description: Units: Count. Count of the number of automatic moves performed by the Remote Pick Assist feature, over the duration of the summary event - specific to Trucks with RPA.

RPAObstaclesCount.description: Units: Count. Count of the number of obstacles detected by the Remote Pick Assist feature, over the duration of the summary event - specific to Trucks with RPA.

RPAStopCount.description: Units: Count. Count of the number of stop commands issued by the Remote Pick Assist feature, over the duration of the summary event - specific to Trucks with RPA.

RPAContinueCount.description: Units: Count. Count of the number of continue commands issued by the Remote Pick Assist feature, over the duration of the summary event - specific to Trucks with RPA.

LiftSequenceNumber.description: Units: Count. A count of the number of load registered events throughout this drive session, indicating the sequence of loads lifted. Count resets to zero at the start of the drive session.

ChecklistDuration.description: Units: Seconds. The combined duration of both the pre-start and post-start checklist.

PreStartChecklistDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the pre-start portion of the checklist.

PreStartChecklist_FaultResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the Pre-Start Checklist. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of zero indicates 'OK' response. Bit value of one indicates 'Fault' response.

PostStartChecklist_FaultResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the Post-Start Checklist. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of zero indicates 'OK' response. Bit value of one indicates 'Fault' response.

Checklist_FaultResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the In-Session Checklist. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of zero indicates 'OK' response. Bit value of one indicates 'Fault' response.

Checklist_LockoutResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the Checklist that caused a lock out (prevents truck from starting until technician performs service). One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of One indicates question response caused lockout.

Checklist_OverTimeResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates whether or not the time to respond to each checklist question exceeded the time limit. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of one indicates question response exceeded limit.

Checklist_QuestionsAnswered.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates which checklist questions were answered. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of one indicates question was answered.

Checklist_NotAllAnswered.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not all checklist questions were answered. Value of true indicates not all questions were answered.

AssetShutdownOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not event triggered Asset / Truck shutdown. Value of true indicates event did trigger Asset / Truck to shutdown.

AssetLockoutOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not event triggered Asset / Truck lockout. Value of true indicates event did trigger Asset / Truck lockout, thereby preventing next Asset / Truck start until review from supervisor / service technician.

AssetDisableOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not operator non-compliance triggered the Asset / Truck to be temporarily disabled relating to this event. Value of true indicates Asset / Truck disable occurred.

AssetDisableCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates total number of times operator non-compliance triggered the Asset / Truck to be temporarily disabled relating to this event.

AccelRaw_Samples.description: Units: direction vector. An array of acceleration vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence. The array must be ordered as contiguous vector points with X component, followed by Y component followed by Z component.

GyroRaw_Samples.description: Units: direction vector. An array of gyro vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence. The array must be ordered as contiguous vector points with X component, followed by Y component followed by Z component.

ImpactMag.title: Impact Magnitude
ImpactMag.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. The magnitude of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

ImpactAngle.title: Impact Angle
ImpactAngle.description: Units: degrees. The angle of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device in the horizontal plane.

ImpactLevel.title: Impact Level
ImpactLevel.description: The level or category of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No level of impact has been defined, impact level is unknown.

oneOf.title: BasicActivity
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Basic Activity, meaning the activity event captured is most likely asset / truck operational noise.

oneOf.title: FullLogging
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Full Logging, meaning the impact event captured was an impact and will be displayed in customer reports.

oneOf.title: Shutdown
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Shutdown, meaning the impact event triggered the asset / truck to be shut down.

ImpactDir.title: Impact Direction
ImpactDir.description: The direction specifier of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No direction specifier has been defined, impact direction is unknown.

oneOf.title: HorizontalLeft
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal left.

oneOf.title: HorizontalRight
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal right.

oneOf.title: HorizontalFront
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal front.

oneOf.title: HorizontalBack
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal back.

oneOf.title: VerticalTop
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as vertical top.

oneOf.title: VerticalBottom
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as vertical bottom.

AccelRaw_SegmentId.description: Units: Count. Specifies the segment number of Accelerometer raw data recorded against an impact occurrence. Segment ID is needed when the entire set of vector sample points do not fit within the limits of one event. Segment number is zero based, so the first segment has a segment ID of zero.

AccelRaw_Units.description: Specifies the units for the array of acceleration vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence.

GyroRaw_Units.description: Specifies the units for the array of gyro vector sample points recorded against an impact occurrence.

AccelRaw_SamplingPeriod.description: Units: 10^-6 Seconds/bit (microseconds). Specifies the period between acceleration vector sample points.

LastDtc_LampStatus.description: The Lamp Status (including Malfunction Indicator, Red Stop, Amber Warning, and Protect Lamp statuses) of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Lamp Status is reported by J1939 DTC format (DM1).

LastDtc_OccurrenceCount.description: The Occurrence Count of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Occurrence Count is reported by J1939 and C29 DTC formats.

LastDtc_ErrorRegister.description: The Error Register of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Error Register is reported by CAN Open DTC format.

LastDtc_ManufacturerSpecific.description: A manufacturer specific byte string reported as part of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Manufacturer Specific byte string is reported by CAN Open DTC format.

LastDtc_ServiceMeter.description: Units: Seconds. The service meter at the time of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus.

LastDtc_BusId.description: The Bus ID of the Asset / Truck CAN Bus where the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) was raised.

FuelCell_DateTime_MeterStart.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of the fuel cell meter change summary event.

FuelCell_DateTime_ReFuelStart.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of the fuel cell re-fuel summary event.

FuelCell_MeterDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the fuel cell meter change summary event.

FuelCell_ReFuelDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the fuel cell re-fuel summary event.

FuelCell_OperatingHours_Delta.description: Units: Seconds. The change in the Fuel Cell Operating Hour Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_HydrogenConsumed_Delta.description: Units: grams. The change in the Fuel Cell Hydrogen Consumed Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_EnergyOutput_Delta.description: Units: Wh. The change in Fuel Cell Energy Output Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_IdleMeter_Delta.description: Units: Seconds. The change in Fuel Cell Idle Meter since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_ReFuelCount_Delta.description: Units: Count. The change in Fuel Cell Re-Fuel Count since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

FuelCell_SessionCount_Delta.description: Units: Count. The change in Fuel Cell Session Count since the last Fuel Cell Meter event was logged.

LogMessage.description: General text message used for the log message event.

ConnectId.description: Units: Unique identifier. Unique number that identifies a particular telemetry device's connection to the telemetry server.

ConnectStatus.title: Connect Status
ConnectStatus.description: Specifies the telemetry device's current connection status to the telemetry server as an integer value.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: Connection status is unknown.

oneOf.title: Connected
oneOf.description: The telemetry device connected to the telemetry server.

oneOf.title: Disconnected
oneOf.description: The telemetry device intentionally disconnected from the telemetry server.

oneOf.title: Dropout
oneOf.description: The telemetry device unintentionally dropped its connection from the telemetry server.

OverloadPeakWeight.description: Units: Kg. The Asset's Peak Load Weight for this individual overload summary event.

OverloadDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset spent overloaded for this individual overload summary event.

OverloadRestoreCount.description: Units: Count. A count of the number of times the operator used the Asset/Truck restore feature while overloaded for this individual overload summary event.

JoinedWiFiSsid.title: Wi-Fi network SSID
JoinedWiFiSsid.description: Units: string name. Specifies the particular Wi-Fi SSID or network name of the WiFi network the device joined, used for the joined wifi network event.

JoinedWiFiSlot.title: Wi-Fi Credential Slot
JoinedWiFiSlot.description: Specifies which credential slot the telemetry device used to join the current WiFi network.

oneOf.title: Primary
oneOf.description: The telemetry device used the primary WiFi credential slot to join the WiFi network.

oneOf.title: Secondary
oneOf.description: The telemetry device used the secondary WiFi credential slot to join the WiFi network.

oneOf.title: Stored
oneOf.description: The telemetry device used the stored WiFi credential slot to join the WiFi network.

JoinedWiFiHashType.title: Wi-Fi Credential Hash Type
JoinedWiFiHashType.description: Specifies the method used to hash the credentials used by the telemetry device to join the current Wi-Fi network.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: The telemetry device's credentials used to join the Wi-Fi network are hashed using unknown method.

oneOf.title: CRC-16 CCITT
oneOf.description: The telemetry device's credentials used to join the Wi-Fi network are hashed using CRC-16 CCITT.

JoinedWiFiHashValue.title: Wi-Fi Credential Hash Value
JoinedWiFiHashValue.description: Units: value. A hash of the credentials used by the telemetry device to join the current Wi-Fi network.

ServiceVendor.title: Service Vendor
ServiceVendor.description: Specifies which vendor is required to perform service on the Asset/Truck. Used with the register service event that remotely contacts a vendor for service.

TyreSensorType.title: Tyre Sensor Type
TyreSensorType.description: Specifies the sensor type that determines Tyre Pressure.

oneOf.title: Continental
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure determined by Continental Sensor using Tire1 j1939 Message 0x18FEF433

oneOf.title: PressurePro
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure determined by Pressure Pro Sensor using Tire2 j1939 Message 0x18FC4233

oneOf.title: Generic
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure sensor specifics are handled by the Truck VSM, presenting a common/generic interface to the Telemetry Device.

TyreLocation.description: Units: Location. Location/Position of Tyre on Asset/Truck. Specified at time of sensor installation. Common location code used is LS 4bits represent tyre position along axle, MS 4bits represent axle number.

TyreSensorStatus.title: Tyre Sensor Status
TyreSensorStatus.description: Units: Status. Specifies the status of a particular tyre's sensor.

TyreStatus.title: Tyre Status
TyreStatus.description: Units: Status. Specifies the status of a particular tyre.

TyreElectFault.title: Wheel End Electrical Fault
TyreElectFault.description: Units: Status. Specifies whether an electrical fault is present on the sensor.

oneOf.title: OK
oneOf.description: OK (no fault)

oneOf.title: Error
oneOf.description: Error (electrical fault)

TyreExtSupport.title: Extended Tyre Pressure Support
TyreExtSupport.description: Units: Status. Specifies whether the extended tyre pressure field is used providing a larger pressure reading range.

oneOf.title: NotUsing
oneOf.description: Not using extended tyre pressure

oneOf.title: Using
oneOf.description: Using extended tyre pressure

TyrePressDetect.title: Tyre Pressure Threshold Detection
TyrePressDetect.description: Units: Status. Specifies the tyre pressure sensor determined pressure fault status.

TyreTempDetectSensor.title: Tyre Temperature Threshold Detection (Sensor)
TyreTempDetectSensor.description: Units: Status. Specifies the tyre pressure sensor determined temperature fault status.

TyreTempDetectTelem.title: Tyre Temperature Threshold Detection (Telemetry)
TyreTempDetectTelem.description: Units: Status. Specifies the telemetry determined tyre temperature fault status, based on over temperature threshold.

TyrePressure.description: Units: 1 kPa/Bit. Current Pressure of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreTemp.title: Tyre Temperature
TyreTemp.description: Units: 0.03125 degC/bit, offset -273 degC. Current Temperature of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreAirLeakage.title: Tyre Air Leakage Rate
TyreAirLeakage.description: Units: 0.1 Pa/s per bit. Air leakage rate of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreRefPressure.title: Reference Tyre Pressure
TyreRefPressure.description: Units: 1 kPa/bit. Defined by j1939 Tire2 message 0x18FC4233 / PGN 64953.

TyreInclFields_TempThresh.title: Temperature Threshold
TyreInclFields_TempThresh.description: Units: Boolean. Tyre Temperature Threshold is available for this tyre pressure event.

TyreInclFields_AirLeak.title: Air Leakage Rate
TyreInclFields_AirLeak.description: Units: Boolean. Tyre Air Leakage Rate is available for this tyre pressure event.

TyreInclFields_RefPress.title: Reference Pressure
TyreInclFields_RefPress.description: Units: Boolean. Reference Tyre pressure is available for this tyre pressure event.

TyreInclFields_Press.title: Tyre Pressure
TyreInclFields_Press.description: Units: Boolean. Tyre Pressure is available for this tyre pressure event.

TyreInclFields_Temp.title: Tyre Temperature
TyreInclFields_Temp.description: Units: Boolean. Tyre Temperature is available for this tyre pressure event.

TPMS_SensorStatus.description: An array containing all 6 last read tyre sensor statuses.

TPMS_TyreStatus.description: An array containing all 6 last read tyre statuses.

TPMS_TempDetect.description: An array containing all 6 last read tyre temperature statuses.

TPMS_PressDetect.description: An array containing all 6 last read tyre pressure statuses.

TPMS_TyreTemp.description: Units: 0.03125 degC/bit, offset -273 degC. An array containing all 6 last read tyre temperatures.

TPMS_TyrePress.description: Units: 1 kPa/Bit. An array containing all 6 last read tyre pressures.

GreaseSource.title: Grease Status Source
GreaseSource.description: Specifies source of lubrication pump / reservoir.

oneOf.title: Frame
oneOf.description: Status of Lubrication Pump mounted on the frame (source address 0x8D)

oneOf.title: Spreader
oneOf.description: Status of Lubrication Pump mounted on the spreader (source address 0x8C)

GreaseLevel.title: Lubrication Reservoir Level
GreaseLevel.description: Reports the status of the lubrication system reservior level. The lubrication reservoir stores the grease for the lubrication.

oneOf.title: OK
oneOf.description: Reservoir Lubrication Level is NOT low.

oneOf.title: ReservoirLow
oneOf.description: The Lubrication Reservoir Level is currently low.

oneOf.title: NotAvailable
oneOf.description: Lubrication Reservoir Level Status is not available e.g. sensor not installed.

GreaseMode.title: Lubrication Operation Mode
GreaseMode.description: Reports the current operational mode status of the lubrication system.

oneOf.title: AutomaticMode
oneOf.description: Automatic is the normal operation mode of lubrication system. In this mode the operator has the privilege to change duty.

oneOf.title: ManualServiceMode
oneOf.description: In manual service mode the service tool temporary takes control of the pump controller for service purposes.

oneOf.title: TestMode1
oneOf.description: The test mode # x shall command the system to perform pre-defined greasing cycles in order to verify operation of the

oneOf.title: TestMode2
oneOf.description: The test mode # x shall command the system to perform pre-defined greasing cycles in order to verify operation of the

oneOf.title: TestMode3
oneOf.description: The test mode # x shall command the system to perform pre-defined greasing cycles in order to verify operation of the

GreasePumpStatus.title: Lubrication Pump Enable Status
GreasePumpStatus.description: Reports the operational status of the lubrication system pump.

GpsPositionId_Util.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured for a specific utilisation summary event.

GpsLat_Util.title: GPS Latitude Start
GpsLat_Util.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced during a specific utilisation summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_Util.title: GPS Longitude Start
GpsLong_Util.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced during a specific utilisation summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

UtilDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of the utilisation summary event.

UtilDistDriven.description: Units: Metres. Sum of distance asset traveled over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilLiftDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset was lifting its tynes/tray/load over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilLowerDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset was lowering its tynes/tray/load over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilAuxHydraulicDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's auxiliary hydraulics were in use over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilFwdDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's transmission was in forward gear over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilRevDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration asset's transmission was in reverse gear over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilAverageSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Average Speed over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilPeakSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Peak Speed over the duration of this utilisation summary event.

UtilStatus_IgnitionOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true truck's Ignition or Key is currently on.

UtilStatus_EngineRunningOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true truck's engine is currently running.

UtilStatus_OpsOn.title: Operator Presence On
UtilStatus_OpsOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true Operator is currently present on the truck.

UtilStatus_TractionOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true truck's drive motor is currently in use.

UtilStatus_HydraulicOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true truck's hydraulics is currently in use.

UtilStatus_LadenOn.description: Units: Boolean. When true truck is currently laden.

SafetyViolationType.title: Safety Violation Type
SafetyViolationType.description: The type of safety violation reported by the safety violation event.

BattChargeState.title: Battery Charge State
BattChargeState.description: The current state of whether or not the battery is being charged for this battery charge event for Sumitomo trucks.

BattChargeDuration.title: Battery Charge Duration
BattChargeDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Duration of time the battery was in the specified charge state for this battery charge event for Sumitomo trucks.

DssType.title: Dynamic Stability System Event Type
DssType.description: Specifies the type of Dynamic Stability System event.

oneOf.title: High Lift Traction
oneOf.description: Mast Height > DSS mast height threshold AND Vehicle speed > DSS high lift traction control reporting threshold value

oneOf.title: High Lift Tilt
oneOf.description: Mast Height > DSS mast height threshold AND Load weight > DSS load weight threshold AND FWD tilt angle > DSS FWD tilt angle limit (Includes when exceeding angle via override button)

oneOf.title: Corner
oneOf.description: Measured vehicle speed > DSS corner control reporting threshold (some speed at some steer angle)

SessionType.description: Specifies the type of session for the asset status event.

oneOf.title: NormalSession
oneOf.description: Session where ID interlock was passed normally

oneOf.title: InterlocksBypassSession
oneOf.description: Session where ID interlock was bypassed.

EngineCoolantTemp.title: Engine Coolant Temperature
EngineCoolantTemp.description: Units: 1 degC/bit. Specifies maximum engine coolant temperature detected over the current drive session.

Container20FtCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 20 foot sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container30FtCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 30 foot sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container40FtCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 40 foot sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

ContainerSingleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of single sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

ContainerDoubleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of double sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container20FtSingleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 20 foot single sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container40FtSingleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 40 foot single sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container20FtDoubleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 20 foot double sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

Container40FtDoubleCount_Start.description: Units: Count. Sum of number of 40 foot double sized containers lifted by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

FuelTankLevel_Start.description: Units: percentage 0.4% per bit. Fuel tank level as a percentage, sampled at the start of this summary event.

DEFTankLevel_Start.description: Units: percentage 0.4% per bit. DEF tank level as a percentage, sampled at the start of this summary event.

EngineOilLevel_Start.description: Units: percentage. Engine oil level as a percentage, sampled at the start of this summary event.

EngineOilLevelBasic_Start.description: Engine oil level sampled at the start of this summary event.

oneOf.title: Bad
oneOf.description: Engine oil level is bad or low.

oneOf.title: Good
oneOf.description: Engine oil level is good or not low.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: It is unknown what the current Engine oil level is.

EngineMode_Start.description: Engine mode sampled at the start of this summary event.

oneOf.title: HiP
oneOf.description: Engine mode is currently high performance.

oneOf.title: ECO
oneOf.description: Engine mode is currently economic mode.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: It is unknown what the current Engine mode is.

ContainerOverride_Start.description: Units: Count. Number of container handling override attempts by the asset over its lifetime, sampled at the start of this summary event.

GpsPosId_FuelBatt.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the time of a fuel/battery level event.

GpsLat_FuelBatt.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the time of a fuel/battery level event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_FuelBatt.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the time of a fuel/battery level event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

ParkBrakeVioType.title: Tyre Temperature Threshold Detection (Sensor)
ParkBrakeVioType.description: Units: Status. Specifies the reason for the park brake violation event.

ParkBrakeSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Speed of the Asset/Truck when park brake was applied. Only used when park brake violation type is speed

GpsPosId_ParkBrake.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the time of park brake event.

GpsLat_ParkBrake.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the time of park brake event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_ParkBrake.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the time of park brake event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

GpsPosId_CSISC.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the time of critical sensor or input state change event.

GpsLat_CSISC.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the time of critical sensor or input state change event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_CSISC.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the time of critical sensor or input state change event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

CS_Value.description: The value of the sensor at the time the critical sensor event was recorded.

CS_Peak.description: The peak value of the sensor measured between first detection of sensor being critical and when the event is recorded. This is effectively the peak sensor value over the report delay time window.

CSS_Thres.description: Threshold value used to determine if the sensor input is in a critical state, for this particular event per settings configuration.

ISC_Value.description: The value of the sensor at the time the input state change event was recorded.

CSS_BuzzDelay.description: Specifies the delay between detection of a critical condition for the associated sensor input and the buzzer sounding, for this particular event per settings configuration.

CSISC_ReportDelay.description: Specifies the delay between detection of a critical condition or state change for the associated sensor input and the occurrence being logged and reported, for this particular event per settings configuration.

CSS_ShutdownDelay.description: Specifies the delay between detection of a critical condition for the associated sensor input and the Asset/Truck being shutdown, for this particular event per settings configuration.

CSS_Options.description: Critical sensor options for this particular sensor event, from settings configuration.

CSISC_Index.description: Identifies which configuration slot this particular sensor input was configured within settings configuration.

CS_Duration.description: Units: Seconds. The period that the sensor was critical.

CSISC_RefId.description: Numeric reference ID of the sensor input to monitor, from settings configuration.

TOTA_NodeRef.description: Node reference of the controller for this truck controller version event.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: Node reference unknown / not specified

TOTA_VerType.description: Type of version number for this truck controller version event.

TOTA_Version.description: Version string for this truck controller version event.

TOTA_CanOpenAddr.description: CAN Open Address of the version string for this truck controller version event.

DtcCleared_OutboundId.title: DTC Cleared OutboundID
DtcCleared_OutboundId.description: Units: outbound ID as string. Indicates the last outbound ID provided by the telemetry server for clearing the truck's DTC history.

topic.description: The payload topic of an MQTT publish packet received by the VAM over the VAM-AiVA WiFi Link.

payload.description: The payload as a byte string of an MQTT publish packet received by the VAM over the VAM-AiVA WiFi link.

BEEventType.description: The sub type of the battery event as an enum value. e.g. charge, usage, over temp, low state of charge etc.

TotalChargeCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of charge cycles for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalRechargeCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of charge cycles that cross the 80% state of charge boundary for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalChargeTime.description: Units: seconds. Indicates the total time spent charging this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

LastChargeTime.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time of last charge for this Asset's/Truck's battery.

TotalChargeAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total ampere-hours recorded during charging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalChargeWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours recorded during charging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalRegenAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total regenerative ampere-hours recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

TotalRegenWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total regenerative kilowatt-hours recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

TotalRegenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total regenerative time recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

RegenRemainderMs.description: Units: Milliseconds. Records the regenerative remainder time in milliseconds left over when accumulating the TotalRegenTime.

TotalRegenCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of regenerative events for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time spent discharging this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total ampere-hours recorded during the discharging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours recorded during the discharging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalBatteryTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total usage time of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

PeakCurrent.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Indicates the absolute peak current delivered to or sourced from this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalOverTempCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of over temperature events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalOverTempDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent over temperature throughout it's lifetime.

TotalLowTempCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of low temperature events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalLowTempDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent under temperature throughout it's lifetime.

TotalLowSOCCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of low state of charge events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalLowSOCDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent in a low state of charge over it's lifetime.
